title: PNW Components Loam Stem is Back in Stock
content:
PNW Componentsâ€˜ Loam Stem has been sold out for a bit and the brand just re-upped its inventory just in time for your spring builds. These come in 31.8 or 35 mm clamp, and in 32 mm or 40 mm lengths. Available in an array of confetti colors, fully CNC machined of lightweight 6061 Alloy, and thoughtfully finished with fancy durable zinc-coated steel bolts. These retail for $99 and are shipping from PNW Components today.

The post PNW Components Loam Stem is Back in Stock appeared first on The Radavist.
author: John Watson
